channel.title: Abouts on Million on Mars
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Million on Mars

item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Your family is coding this game on a boat!?

How does that work?

item.title: About Million on Mars
item.description: You are the Executive Directory of Delta Colony, one of several colonies with seed funding from Leon Dusk, the Chairman of ZeeSpace, Inc.

item.title: Million on Mars Team
item.description: Kaiwen Bethke Iron Chef Cheerleader Travel Guru Admiral all around awesome sauce! Max Bethke 13 years old Graphics Designer Lead Engineer - Client (UX) Navigator Max learned python at 11 as well as self learning how to pixel art. He works on the user side of the game and also works on the milliononmars.com website’s css and html. On the boat he works as the navigator using the navigation console to help plot courses and record logs in the logbook.
